response.original_title: Tampa Bay Lightning 2021 Stanley Cup Champions
response.overview: The Tampa Bay Lightning are back-to-back Stanley Cup Champions! NHL Studios provides you with an all-access pass to the Tampa Bay Lightning’s incredible journey through the 2020-21 NHL season. Led by Captain Steven Stamkos, Conn Smythe Trophy winner Andrew Vasilevskiy and a superstar core including winger Nikita Kucherov and defenseman Victor Hedman, the Tampa Bay Lightning will once again have their names engraved on the most coveted trophy in all of sports - the Stanley Cup. This is your chance to relive every moment of Tampa. Bay’s historic run. From their banner unveiling on opening night, to a condensed regular season schedule against Division rivals night in and night out, all the way through the Stanley Cup Playoffs, the Lightning have defended their title to keep the Stanley Cup in what has now becom. E known as ‘Champa Bay!’
response.title: Tampa Bay Lightning 2021 Stanley Cup Champions
